item.title: Ruby
item.description: Ruby notes Whero do gems get installed? Just type: $ gem env https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3408868/where-do-gems-install Problem was gem install installed stuff correctly, but couldn’t execute those gems. So I needed to add to the PATH the directories under GEM PATHS section
